mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT ci.file_name FROM court_image ci WHERE ci.court_idx = c.court_idx ORDER BY ci.photo_idx ASC LIMIT 1) AS first_img_name , c.court_name ,c.court_address ,c.court_info ,c.court_price ,c.court_state ,c.court_official ,(SELECT COUNT(j.court_idx) from jjim j where j.court_idx = c.court_idx and j.id = 'admin') as jjim ,c.court_idx FROM court c WHERE c.court_state = 'true' AND c.court_official = 'false'

SELECT (SELECT ci.file_name FROM court_image ci WHERE ci.court_idx = c.court_idx ORDER BY ci.photo_idx ASC LIMIT 1) AS first_img_name , c.court_name ,c.court_address ,c.court_info ,c.court_price ,c.court_state ,c.court_official ,(SELECT COUNT(j.court_idx) from jjim j where j.court_idx = c.court_idx and j.id = 'admin') as jjim ,c.court_idx FROM court c WHERE c.court_state = 'true' AND c.court_official = 'false' AND c.court_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param1}, '%')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM jjim WHERE id = #{param1} AND court_idx = #{param2}
